spec_data.Name: thefuck
spec_data.Description:
This application corrects your previous console command.
If you use BASH, you should add these lines to your .bashrc:
alias fuck='eval $(thefuck $(fc -ln -1)); history -r'
alias FUCK='fuck'
For other shells please check /usr/share/doc/thefuck/README.md
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 09:41:15 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: App that corrects your previous console command
